articles.title: Premier League rules on when Salah can return to Liverpool after positive Coronavirus test - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool star Mohamed Salah tested positive for COVID-19 again on Wednesday evening, the Egypt FA confirmed
articles.content:
Mohamed Salah has tested positive of COVID-19 for the second time and will not be available to face Leicester City on Sunday.
